The eight amazing and incredible qualiti: He sobered up and was inspired upon seeing the Buddha
He paid homage to the Buddha and undertook the five training rules with celibacy as the fifth
He gave away his teenage wife without getting upset
He shared his wealth without reserve with ethical people of good character
He paid homage to and listened carefully to mendicants who taught him the Dhamma, and taught those who didn't
He gave impartially to the Saá¹…gha
He didn't get too excited when deities came to him and announced the Buddha's teaching is well explained
He was bound by no fetter that might return him to this world.
